name: Unmaned Station
description:
Special thanks to Robert Yang, Matt Boch, Rachel, Yuqi and fellow students.

A 3 weeks project for NYU Game Center MFA program.

Made by Will Jiang and Yamiao Liu.

Thanks for playing.

- Use "WASD" and mouse to control;

- Press "R" to restart;

- Press "Esc" to quit;

- Enjoy!
